title.full: Combat Wings The Great Battles Of World War II

description.full: Piloting a wide range of aircraft, players engage in aerial dog fights and dangerous fighter missions across the major theaters of war during WWII. Featuring realistic aircraft, Combat Wings: The Great Battles of WWII introduces cutting-edge flight dynamics with unprecedented arcade accessibility. Combat Wings recreates the most interesting battles of WWII. Players will engage in combat piloting historical planes: Spitfire, P-51 Mustang, and many others. The planes are all based on the original aircraft. The game offers many different missions: dynamic dogfights, escort missions and ground assaults. Combat Wings is the pinnacle of good air combat!
description.short: Piloting a wide range of aircraft, players engage in aerial dog fights and dangerous fighter missions across the major theaters of war during WWII. Featuring realistic aircraft, Combat Wings: The Great Battles of WWII introduces cutting-edge flight dynamics with unprecedented arcade accessibility.
